name: Escape the Hospital?..
description: Escape the Hospital is a simple top down choice-based adventure RPG shooter horror storyline comedy troll simulator, with colors. This game has everything you need. It has a title screen, an end screen, challenging boss fights, comic relief, hidden clues, blood curtleing suspense, deep endings, and loveable characters. Once your start playing this game you'll love it so much you won't want to finish (it makes sense if you don't think about it). There is no loosing screen because i never loose.
